rows.label: qst102101_msg0001
rows.name: How odd.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0002
rows.name:
Lately, the Hræsvelgr
Mercenary Corps missions
haven't been going smoothly.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0003
rows.name:
Subjugation targets are already
gone, or harvesting spots have
been picked clean...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0004
rows.name: This has to be intentional sabotage.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0005
rows.name:
Actually, these incidents started
right around the time our number
of mercenaries increased...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0006
rows.name: A spy among the new recruits...?

rows.label: qst102101_msg0007
rows.name:
I'd rather not think it, but I
have to rule out the possibility.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0008
rows.name: As discreetly as possible...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0009
rows.name:
You carry on Vandham's will. I'm
sure I can trust you with this...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0010
rows.name: Alright, here's the plan.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0011
rows.name:
I want you to go on a
subjugation mission with
some of the new recruits.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0012
rows.name:
I need you to watch them for any
suspicious activity. Can you do that?

rows.label: qst102101_msg0013
rows.name: Right. Let me call the other three.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0101
rows.name: Good, you're all here.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0102
rows.name: First, let's have some introductions...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0103
rows.name:
I'm Rex! I'm a salvager!
Nice to meet you!

rows.label: qst102101_msg0104
rows.name: I'm Bamibami. A pleasure, mo!

rows.label: qst102101_msg0105
rows.name: Juddit.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0106
rows.name: ...Arthem.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0107
rows.name:
I have a subjugation mission
for the four of you.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0108
rows.name:
We've confirmed twelve
Spike Urchons in the area.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0109
rows.name:
They're nasty creatures... I need
you to take out every last one.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0110
rows.name: That's a lot...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0111
rows.name:
Which is why you'll need
to work together on this.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0112
rows.name: I refuse.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0113
rows.name:
I came to this mercenary corps
so I could do things my way.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0114
rows.name:
Teaming up with people whose skills
I don't even know? No thanks.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0115
rows.name:
Um, Juddit-san? Please don't
disrupt the group, mo.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0116
rows.name:
Here in the Hræsvelgr
Mercenary Corps, cooperation
is everything, mo...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0117
rows.name: Let's split up.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0118
rows.name: I was still talking, mo...!

rows.label: qst102101_msg0119
rows.name: Agreed.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0120
rows.name:
For a Superbian, you
actually make a good point.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0121
rows.name: Three each, then.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0122
rows.name: But if we get separated...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0123
rows.name: This way is more efficient.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0124
rows.name:
Hmph... Fine. After you're done,
let's meet at the camp overlooking
Farlaine Wells, mo.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0125
rows.name: That place? Fine.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0126
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0127
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Hmmm... Is this "freedom,"
or are they just all
incredibly stubborn...?

rows.label: qst102101_msg0128
rows.name: ...I wish you the best of luck.
